attributes.action: Provide more speialist spinal injury units in uk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the uk there are still people who suffer spinal injuries being treated in General hospitals.  Because of this many people are unable to gain vital acess to specialist treatment to enable them to recover to their full potential.
I urge you to petition the government to give more money to the NHS to provide more spinal units particulary in North Wales
